snippet: Police opened fire Monday on protesters attempting to disrupt a political rally, killing at least three, in southern Nepal where violent protests last year left dozens dead and blocked the border, causing severe fuel shortages....

headline.main: Greece Seizes Amphetamines Suspected to Be Destined for Middle East
headline.print_headline: Greece Seizes Amphetamines Suspected to Be Destined for Middle East

lead_paragraph: Police opened fire Monday on protesters attempting to disrupt a political rally, killing at least three, in southern Nepal where violent protests last year left dozens dead and blocked the border, causing severe fuel shortages.
